item.title: Doing Math With Perl6
item.description: Sets Perl 6 包括 Set 数据类型，以及对大多数 set 操作的支持。并集和交集不仅是原生操作，它们使用自然符号 ∩ 和 ∪。例如，此代码将检查有限数量集的集算术的基本定律： my @arbitrary-numbers = ^100; my \U = @arbitrary-numbers.Set; my @sets; @sets.push: Set.new( @arbitrary-numbers.pick( @arbitrary-numbers.elems.rand)) for @arbitrary-numbers; my (@union, @intersection); for @sets -> $set { @union.push: $set ∩ $set === $set; @intersection.push: $set ∪ $set === $set; } say "Idempotent union is ", so @union.all; # OUTPUT: «Idempotent union is True» say "Idempotent intersection is ", so @intersection.all; # OUTPUT: «Idempotent intersection is True» my (@universe, @empty-set, @id-universe, @id-empty); for @sets -> \A { @universe.
